channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 16:35 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 16:35 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 16:20 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 16:20 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further reports. #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 16:17 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 16:17 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. item.title: 🟢 16:06 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟡 15:53 ​​Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Pokrovsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 15:53 ​​Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m.
